EmailTemplate.name: Weekly Update 18th October, 2012
EmailTemplate.subject: Weekly News Update 18th October, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Looking for an engaging unique educational experience that will challenge and excite your child/ren? Please click here for a follow up of the information we sent out last week regarding TechnoKidz, the new After School Activity.
Please remember, although I'm sure this is probably one of the first things you wrote down in your diaries, that next week is half term and there will be no school.
We would like to wish you a fantastic break and look forward to seeing you back on the Monday 29th October.
Happy Holidays!
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
